attributes.action: Private car users for business miles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time the 40p per mile tax free mileage allowance was raised to reflect the huge increase in the cost of fuel. It is now at the stage where the allowance does not cover the running costs by any means.  I think that, considering the sharp rise in the cost of living over the last few years, to have not adjusted something that was set in 2002 is bit lame.  The mp's don't mind us paying for their expenses, what about ours?!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
